page.title: 14HILLINGDON SHOW.
page.content: The {Hillingdon Show }is held every year in the month of June, it is usually held on the 23rd - 24th, otherwise it is the nearest Saturday and Sunday. Lots of activities take place there such as country dancing, the police, advertisements and the Pepsi challenge. The Hillingdon Show starts at 9.00 in the morning. Clair Walker and Anita Gill both went.They got to the Hillingdon Show at 9.45 where Anita split up from her parents. On their way round they collected bags, badges, hats, pens and balloons. After that they went to the farm to see the animals.Then they went to the fair and won a goldfish. There were {Showjumping} events too. They went back to the car at 4.00 and left the show at 5.00.
